Sustainable Cork Fund

It is a collaboration funt of over €200,000 to support non profit organizations with the purpose of increasing sustainability in the urban and rural communities. Its main focus will be Climate Action, Community inclusion and cohesion and Sustainable employment and economic development

SuperValu Tidy Towns

The national SuperValu Tidy Towns competition is an annual contests, in wich participants can raise awareness of many emviromental issues and discuss those with the relevant authorities. Also there are some major prizes you might get, it is also develop across all villages of Ireland
